Boakye Kyeremateng Agyarko (1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye bụbu onye na-echekwa ego. Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Bank of New York. Ọ bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka ike na Ghana.
A mụrụ Agyarko na 1956, na Kumasi na mpaghara Ashanti na Kwasi Agyarbo

Nna ya bụ onye ahịa na onye na-eme ihe ike na United Party si Jamase, Ashanti Region na nne ya bụ Jane Ladze Padi si Krobo Odumase na Eastern Region. Ọ bụ nwanne Dedo Difie Agyarko-Kusi na Emmanuel Kwabena Kyeremateng Agyarbo.
Agyarko gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị K
Methodist dị na Ashtown na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology Primary School na Kumasi
Ọ gakwara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Mfantsipim dị na Cape Coast maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ebe o nwetara ma GCE Ordinary Level na GCE Advanced Level
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Economics and Political Science na Mahadum Ghana, Legon
Ọ kwagara United States of America dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ nwetara nzere ọkachamara dị elu na ụlọ akụ site na American Institute of Banking na Master of Business Administration na Financial Economics site na Mahadum Pace, New York.

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ghana na 1980, Agyarko rụrụ ọrụ mba ya na Ghana Union Nation of Students dị ka onye nhazi mba. Mgbe ọrụ mba ahụ kwụsịrị na 1981, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na Management and Investment Consultants na Accra
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo 1984 ebe a manyere ya ịgbapụ Ghana n'ihi mgbalị igbu ya.
